column3: This place has the best turkey club. I used to get it about once a week when I worked near there. I left that job in 2017, and live an hour from the city. I still consider making a special trip into the city to get that turkey club. Maybe it's changed but probably not. And the people that work there are really nice.
Nice and local. Decent meals. Recommend.

One of my favourite places just round the corner from my apartment. Incredibly kind, friendly team & owners. Always greets you with a smile. I love how they remember my order and never say no to my own brought tupperware. I get take out from this place almost every week. Sometimes twice. Recommend it 100%
Perfect neighborhood spot for a quick bite. Owners are are friendly and attentive.  I noticed that they knew more than half of the customers by name.

Only the locals know about it kind of eatery with an incredible electrofrying eclectic tasty menu served all day!  Lots of Korean influenced dishes served Bento Box style. I had the Hawaiian Break Fast ..... O HOW TAYSTEEEE! 1338 Franklin SF

I work construction and eat out at least once a week. During the construction of sutter hospital I went here often. Recently (a couple years later now) I walked up and ordered a to go order. (covid). Still excellent, clean and very nice owners. The photo is from today and is a Bento box combo order of short ribs and spicy pork. and now I'm hungry again 😁 Bon Appétit
So this litte jem was just what i need..the food is great, price are to value , friendly, clean,  most important lot's of  Regular customers,can wait to go again.
Hidden neighborhood gem with delicious and reasonably priced lunch. Service is super speedy and friendly.

This is the best spot for breakfast that have found so far in the city. I will say that the quests are mostly local construction workers and this that live close but don't let that distract you. They gave an amazing set of dishes like their Hawaiian breakfast and house omelet, both are amazing. What they don't have is a lot of flair but the flavor makes up for it.
Great place for a quick bite. The food is very flavorful. Decent Vegan options. The service is amazing here.

I love Pacific Plaza! They are the nicest people and have a great memory. They always know my "usual" order and my name when I come in, and seemingly everyone else's as well. The food is always good and at a reasonable lunch price. I've been coming here for years since it's near my office and it continues to be a staple for me. Highly recommend!
I came here for a business brunching. The staff was extremely attentive and polite No complaints

Great food. American breakfast and deli sandwiches for lunch, or yummy Korean options. Efficient, friendly counter service with seating for about 40. Big portions, reasonable prices. Always filled with friendly construction crews. My favorite place to stop after seeing my doctor around the corner!!
The best lunch spot near CPMC!

This place is our weekly go-to spot. They are very quick in getting your items ready. The food is delicious, tons of great variety from sandwiches, rice bowls to udon and more! The family is also very kind and friendly. Amazing all around!

Before going in, I thought it was a small place. Really didn’t expect it to have so many seatings (probably 20+), and 6 people working behind the  small counter. The operation was really efficient; I got my BLT sandwich in a few minutes when it’s busy at lunch time. The sandwich was perfect, the bacon crispy but not too burnt or dried. I was so hungry that I forgot to take a photo before eating it. Lol. Price was really resealable. Will check out their Korean food next time.

Awesome little mom'n'pop shop. I always get sandwiches in the afternoon or American style breakfasts in the morning and both are excellent. The korean BBQ is nice to change it up sometimes and the menu has some other stuff I haven't even tried yet
Great portions and very flavorful!

Came here for breakfast and was met by a very homey, Korean family owned hole in the wall. The family all spoke great English (one called me bruh) and were overall very hospitable and warm!  Food I had was simple (eggs, home fries, toast and sausage) but nicely done.  Will definitely be coming back
Small staff but quick service! The whole team is extremely nice love going for breakfast and lunch! **Bring Back The Big Breakfast**
Really amazing food! The tuna melt with jalapeno was the best I've ever had. It was a pleasant surprise and delicious experience!
Good variety of breakfast and lunch items at a fair price. It's a family run place that cares about their customers. Just wished they served breakfast later into the day.
One of the best places to have lunch in the City! The sandwiches are delicious with all the sides and condiments that you want and need. Staff is terrific and friendly.
Still offering great to-go options for Breakfast & Lunch during shelter-in-place. Support your local mom & pop shop— and get delicious Korean food (& at a great price!)
The best Korean food in the area. Great service and very friendly.
Lots of items on the menu to choose from. Food was pretty good but the service is excellent. Friendly, like your neighborhood cafe and helpful

I stopped in for breakfast. The breakfast sandwich I ordered was delicious and made when I ordered it. The coffee was good and there was a lot of other food items that looked delicious. I will have to go back.
Hidden gem for sure! Great Korean food
Great food!  Tasty & well prepared!  Friendly Staff and excellent service!
Food is fantastic! People are super friendly. Went back a week later but that were closed.
The first place I think of when ordering breakfast, brunch and lunch. Delicious food and super friendly staff!
Good service and delicious food
I love this place! They're friendly, fast and professional. Their food is always on point.
$11 combo bento Box! Bomb! Quality meats and vegetables and ingredients! Best lunch spot on Franklin!
Lunch is great hoped they opened earlier for breakfast.
Quick, easy and affordable spot for breakfast and lunch.  Family run, and they remember you if you visit on the regular
Need a quick little breakfast before beginning your day? Go where all the workers were going. This a clean, friendly little place.
Very nice people, good prices, and nicely prepared 😃 …
Excellent food ,lots to choose from ,just had breakfast ,fast & polite service
A nice go-to for a wide variety of foods.
Just started going to this place......LOVE IT!!👍 The spicy pork & the bibimbap is also must …
Good lunch and great prices
Excellent food and equal service. Our 'local' breakfast stop.
Food was great. Big portions and tasty.
Great food good prices nice people
Family run friendly local spot. Serves breakfast and lunch.
Best soup and sandwich combos inn the city.
Good food, cheap and cheerful, no frills cafe
Good service, good food good price.
excellent, quick, and cheap. perfect for lunch!
Don't get a salad - they're not very good quality.
Ma korean family got going on!
Had an awesome breakfast here.
Everything here is good and the prices are good
Good food cheap prices
Amazing food 😋 …
I live it
Exelent service
Like the breakfast
Good food the people serve you very well very friendly
Good service and everyone is very friendly
